_comment_n: -n: Number of GPUs to use for the test (minimum 2 for meaningful multi-GPU communication)
_comment_b: -b: Minimum message size (starting size for test sweep)
_comment_e: -e: Maximum message size (ending size for test sweep)
_comment_f: -f: Multiplication factor between message sizes (size progression)
_comment_G: -G: Enable HIP graph capture and replay N times (1 = capture once and replay once)
